file_content.text: You've caused quite a bit of trouble, but I'm afraid it's over now. I'll ask you to drop your weapons and surrender.
That's not gonna happen.
No.
Then I'll have no choice but to subdue you.
So... has that ever worked?
You Jedi are funny.
Some people have sense, others must be persuaded.
It's over when this cruiser's in a thousand pieces.
I'm just getting started.
If that's true, then I must stop you before you do more damage.
You will drop your weapons and surrender to me.
Sorry. I'm not open to suggestions.
Nice try.
Uh, no I won't.
Are you slow or something?
You will realize what a complete idiot you are.
I can wave my hands too.
Master?
Be still, Padawan. I will take care of this. This bounty hunter has a much stronger will than the other one.
Listen, I know the Mandalorians want me dead, but the Battle of Coruscant was years ago. Revenge profits no one.
I implore you not to throw your life away. Abandon this hunt.
You have your codes. I have mine. Always fulfill a contract.
Sorry, it's my job. [Attack]
And miss all the fun? No way.
I'm looking forward to this.
I'm sorry that you leave me no choice. One way or another, I will stop you.
You're wasting your breath and my time. Die!
Implore all you want. [Attack]
Thendys, your lightsaber!
